content.raw: `/X1/pose` contains transforms from the model frame to the links and sensors in the model. When `enableGroundTruth=true`, the topic also contains the transform from the world to the model frame. This is why you would get translation values that seem erratic. The easiest way to obtain just the pose of the vehicle is using TF.
